description.brief: Controlling and acquiring data from Axis IP-based cameras

package.description:
There are many ways to get images out of Axis IP-based cameras. The simplest is to just call 'wget' over and over. This is what the 'axis_cam_wget' and 'axis_cam_wget_polled' programs do.
In the future, I may add more sophisticated (more efficient) transport methods.
package.author: Morgan Quigley (email: mquigley@cs.stanford.edu)
